EmailTemplate.subject: Yodle Pre Fix - Please "Accept"
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Client_First_Name__c},
Thank you for your interest in Yodle.
As noted in Section 4 below, to accept the terms and conditions below of the Yodle Pre Fix Program, please reply to this e-mail with "Accept" in the body.
Additional Terms and Conditions These additional terms and conditions (the “Additional Terms”) are in addition to and part of the Order Form and Customer Terms and Conditions between Yodle and Customer dated as of the date Customer accepts these Additional Terms (collectively, the "Agreement").
1. In connection with the Pre Fix Program, Customer’s monthly advertising budget will be reduced only as a result of Qualified Leads generated by Yodle. A “Qualified Lead” is: (a) any filled out email form generated from the Yodle adverSite or Dynamic Mirror that includes the user’s contact information or an inquiry about Customer’s services; or (b) any phone call generated from the Yodle adverSite or Dynamic Mirror call tracking phone number that results in a caller inquiry about Customer’s services; or (c) for any legal services provider that opts not to have call recording activated, any phone call generated from the Yodle adverSite or Dynamic Mirror call tracking phone number that lasts at least 30 seconds. The determination as to whether a Qualified Lead has been provided is in Yodle’s reasonable discretion.
2. The price for each Qualified Lead is {!Case.Budget__c}.
3. Except as modified by these Additional Terms, all of the terms and provisions of the Agreement remain in full force and effect.
4. Customer accepts these Additional Terms by replying to this e-mail with "Accept". This action creates an electronic signature that has the same legal force and effect as a handwritten signature on a written contract under any applicable law or regulation, and is equally binding.
Please contact your Yodle sales representative if you have any questions.
Sincerely,
Yodle Contracts Team contracts@yodle.com
